encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

keywords.term: Antiphanes; Anthropogonia, last three verses, with end title

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Implement changes requested by Sampson and finalize.
Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Implement changes requested by Sampson and finalize.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Some housekeeping needed. Text: replace lunate sigmas throughout; in l. 1 --> γεγενημένοι; in Leiden+, paragraphoi do not get their own line numbers, but these aren’t paragraphoi (they are superstrokes above and below the last letters of letters of the end-title, as in ed.pr.); I think there’s vac.ca.4lin before the first line of the end-title, and vac.1lin in between the two lines of the end-title. Metadata: no volume number needed for 95233 or 12468; add links to http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=348&ref=Papyrus_1525 for online catalogue entry and to http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/Viewer.aspx?ref=papyrus_1525_f001v for online image; add ‘comedy’ to keywords; update line count in physical description -->5;

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Some housekeeping needed. Text: replace lunate sigmas throughout; in l. 1 --> γεγενημένοι; in Leiden+, paragraphoi do not get their own line numbers, but these aren’t paragraphoi (they are superstrokes above and below the last letters of letters of the end-title, as in ed.pr.); I think there’s vac.ca.4lin before the first line of the end-title, and vac.1lin in between the two lines of the end-title. Metadata: no volume number needed for 95233 or 12468; add links to http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=348&ref=Papyrus_1525 for online catalogue entry and to http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/Viewer.aspx?ref=papyrus_1525_f001v for online image; add ‘comedy’ to keywords; update line count in physical description -->5;

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2019.02.26 by Jacques A. Bromberg. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: "Added metadata and text (using high resolution images from BL) during 2018 webinar "Greek Papyri in the British Library"
